00017 #ifndef WEIGHTED_SUMS_SCORE_AND_DATASET_MP_HEADER_FILE
00018 #define WEIGHTED_SUMS_SCORE_AND_DATASET_MP_HEADER_FILE
00019 
00020 #include <WeightedSumsScore.H>
00021 #include <RigidAlignWithDsetMP.H>
00022 #include <cassert>
00023 
00024 namespace SimSite3D{
00025 
00027 class WSS_and_dataset_MP : public WeightedSumsScore{
00028 public:
00029   typedef std::less<my_float_t>         score_cmp; 
00030 
00032   WSS_and_dataset_MP() 
00033   { 
00034   }
00035 
00037   virtual ~WSS_and_dataset_MP() 
00038   { 
00039   }
00040 
00043 
00051   my_float_t
00052   score(const ModelSitemap &model, const DbaseSitemap &dbase,
00053         RigidAlignWithDsetMP *scores)
00054         
00055 //        rigid_align_t *scores)
00056   {
00057     my_float_t site_score = WeightedSumsScore::score(model, dbase, scores);
00058 
00059     scores->dataset_mp.resize(dbase.fit_points_size());
00060     std::fill(scores->dataset_mp.begin(), scores->dataset_mp.end(), false);
00061   
00062     //std::fill(A_closest_pts, A_closest_pts + 4*A_max_num_pts, my_float_max);
00063     // get A_closest_pts from base class
00064 
00065     std::vector<bool>::iterator D_MP_start = scores->dataset_mp.begin();
00066 
00067     const HbondPoints& S_hbonds = dbase.hbond_points();
00068     const my_float_t* S_hbonds_coords_start = S_hbonds.fit_pts_beg()->pos;
00069     const HbondPoints& M_hbonds = model.hbond_points();
00070     std::vector<bool>::const_iterator M_hit = scores->match_print.begin();
00071     const my_float_t* cp = WeightedSumsScore::closest_points();
00072     for(hbond_fit_pt_vci M = M_hbonds.fit_pts_beg(); M < M_hbonds.fit_pts_end();
00073         ++M, ++M_hit, cp += 3){
00074       if(*M_hit && *cp < my_float_max){
00075         int idx = (cp - S_hbonds_coords_start ) / 3;    
00076         assert(idx >= 0);
00077         *(D_MP_start + idx) = true;
00078       }
00079     }
00080   
00081     const HphobPoints& M_hphobs = model.hphob_points();
00082     const HphobPoints& S_hphobs = dbase.hphob_points();
00083     const my_float_t* S_hphob_coords_start = S_hphobs.begin()->pos;
00084     D_MP_start += 3 * S_hbonds.fit_pts_size(); 
00085     for(hphob_point_lci H = M_hphobs.begin(); H != M_hphobs.end();
00086         ++H, ++M_hit, cp += 3){
00087       if(*M_hit && *cp < my_float_max){
00088         int idx = (cp - S_hphob_coords_start ) / 3;    
00089         assert(idx >= 0);
00090         *(D_MP_start + idx) = true;
00091       }
00092     }
00093 
00094     return site_score;
00095   }
00096 
00097 private:
00098 
00099 };
00100 } // end namespace SimSite3D
00101 #endif
